workouts.name: Lower Back Stretches
workouts.description: A series of gentle stretches to relieve lower back tension and improve flexibility

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.instructions: Start on hands and knees. Alternate between arching your back up (cat) and dropping your belly down (cow).

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.instructions: Kneel and sit back on your heels, stretching arms forward on the floor.

exercises.name: Knee-to-Chest Stretch
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back and pull one knee toward your chest while keeping the other leg flat.

workouts.name: Shoulder Mobility
workouts.description: Exercises to improve shoulder range of motion and reduce stiffness

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.instructions: Extend arms to sides and make small circles, gradually increasing size.

exercises.name: Wall Slides
exercises.instructions: Stand with back against wall, arms in 'W' position. Slide arms up to 'Y' position and back down.

exercises.name: Cross-Body Stretch
exercises.instructions: Pull one arm across your body at shoulder height using the opposite hand.

exercises.name: Doorway Stretch
exercises.instructions: Stand in doorway with arms on frame at 90 degrees, gently lean forward.

workouts.name: Knee Strengthening
workouts.description: Build strength around the knee joint to improve stability and reduce pain

exercises.name: Straight Leg Raises
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, one knee bent, one leg straight. Raise straight leg to height of bent knee.

exercises.name: Wall Sits
exercises.instructions: Lean against wall with knees at 90 degrees as if sitting in a chair.

exercises.name: Step-Ups
exercises.instructions: Step up onto a low platform, focusing on using the stepping leg to lift your body.

exercises.name: Clamshells
exercises.instructions: Lie on side with knees bent. Keep feet together and raise top knee like a clamshell opening.

workouts.name: Core Stability
workouts.description: Strengthen your core muscles to support your spine and improve posture

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with arms up and knees at 90 degrees. Lower opposite arm and leg while keeping back flat.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.instructions: On hands and knees, extend opposite arm and leg while maintaining a stable spine.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold a push-up position on forearms, keeping body in a straight line.

exercises.name: Bridge
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with knees bent, lift hips toward ceiling, squeezing glutes at top.

workouts.name: Ankle Recovery
workouts.description: Gentle exercises to rehabilitate ankle injuries and improve stability

exercises.name: Ankle Circles
exercises.instructions: Lift foot off ground and rotate ankle in circles, both clockwise and counterclockwise.

exercises.name: Alphabet Writing
exercises.instructions: Use your big toe to trace each letter of the alphabet in the air.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.instructions: Stand on both feet, raise up onto toes, then slowly lower back down.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Balance
exercises.instructions: Stand on one foot, maintaining balance. Progress by closing eyes.
